name: Rose Garden Window
description: The main idea is to create a more structured and grid-like pattern where shapes are aligned in rows and columns, looking like a mosiac in a church window.

name: Nested Squares
description: This work is inspired by nested square patterns and line thickness variations. I created a piece featuring a grid of nested squares with different stroke weights and colors. The squares get smaller toward the center, giving a subtle impression of being in space.

name: Monochrome Nested Squares
description: The size of each square changes depending on how far it is from the center. Each square also has slightly different stroke thickness and color, creating a lively, abstract pattern.

name: Rainy Day
description: Created a soft image by overlapping circles with random colors. It is inspired by raindrops on a rainy day and the rainbow reflected on them with a lowered transparency.

name: Abstract Water Drop
description: I initially imagined water drops and aimed to depict droplets scattered across a flower field. This is a variation of Rainy Day.

name: Sparkler in Summer Night
description: Popping colors and shapes that look like a sparkler (firework). I inspired by the fireworks and the CodePen Home Creative Coding - Particle experiment by Garrit.

name: Black Hole
description: It creates a dynamic field of rotating letters arranged around the center of the canvas. Each character orbits with its own speed, size, and brightness, leaving subtle motion trails that build a glowing, almost cosmic atmosphere.

name: Chasing Letters
description: It sketch animates letters that smoothly follow the user's mouse cursor across the screen. Each letter has its own angle, radius, and speed, and moves with easing based on calculations, creating a dynamic, trailing effect that responds in real-time to user movement.

name: Green Flow Field
description: It shows green particles flowing along a perlin noise vector field over a radial gradient. Particle speed and transparency vary dynamically, creating depth and motion across the canvas

name: Sound Field
description: This interactive work shows white particles moving over a radial gradient background. Clicking the mouse plays a random note with Tone.js, linking simple interaction to both sound and motion.
